item.title: produkt
item.description: construction for the final circuit input and output buffering and biasing is needed. the buffering is done with opamps. 2021-12-07T12:05:01.282065 image/svg+xml Matplotlib v3.5.0, https://matplotlib.org/ *{stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: butt} 2021-12-07T12:05:01.

item.title: steckfeld
item.description: construction the function depends on the patching and settings of the potentiometers. an attenuverter is used in different modules like the Serge VCS, Maths and also in the polivoks filter. while this module can be used as a simple mixer you can also adjust cv signals. such a signal can be simply attenuated or inverted. when feeding in a positive singal slope (for example from an adsr). the signal will be turned to a neagative dc singal.

item.title: kraft
item.description: construction The circuit is very simple. The 15AC input is half bridge rectified. The positive half is providing the +15V, the negative the -15V. The capacitors remove the ripple and the regulators provide a clean DC voltage. The 5V regulator circuit is taken directly from the datasheet. The 5V should not be used for audio circuits. It is meant to drive LED's and as input for regulators providing the power for a microchip.
